title: Conformal Generative Modeling on Triangulated Surfaces. (arXiv:2303.10251v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: We propose conformal generative modeling, a framework for generative modeling on 2D surfaces approximated by discrete triangle meshes. Our approach leverages advances in discrete conformal geometry to develop a map from a source triangle mesh to a target triangle mesh of a simple manifold such as a sphere. After accounting for errors due to the mesh discretization, we can use any generative modeling approach developed for simple manifolds as a plug-and-play subroutine. We demonstrate our framework on multiple complicated manifolds and multiple generative modeling subroutines, where we show that our approach can learn good estimates of distributions on meshes from samples, and can also learn simultaneously from multiple distinct meshes of the same underlying manifold.

translated_title: 内在对称性生成模型的三角面上的拟合
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种称为内在对称性生成模型的框架，用于在由离散三角形网格近似的二维面上进行生成建模。我们的方法利用离散共形几何的进展，开发了一种从源三角网格到简单流形（例如球体）的目标三角网格的映射。在考虑网格离散化误差后，我们可以将任何为简单流形开发的生成建模方法作为即插即用的子例程使用。我们在多个复杂的流形和多个生成建模子例程上演示了我们的框架，在那里我们展示了我们的方法可以从样本中学习网格上的分布的良好估计，并且也能同时从同一底层流形的多个不同网格中进行学习。
tldr: 提出了一种在三角面上进行生成模型的内在对称性生成模型，使用离散共形几何的进展将面网格映射到球形，可以通过任何已经开发为简单流形的生成模型方法进行训练。演示了这种方法在多个流形和多个生成模型子例程上的有效性。
en_tdlr: Conformal generative modeling is proposed for generative modeling on 2D surfaces approximated by discrete triangle meshes. A map from a source to a target triangle mesh is developed using discrete conformal geometry, and any generative modeling approach can be used for training. The effectiveness of this approach is demonstrated on multiple manifolds and generative modeling subroutines.
